attributes.action: stop G.P.surgery's taking on to many patients.
attributes.background: waiting 3/4 weeks to see a G.P.is far to long for people to have to wait to see their G.P.. Or to even get a telephone consultation.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about whether to take on new patients are a matter for individual GPSs, not the UK Government or Parliament.
